verses.text: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*, \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* escaped \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* orders \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w*, enchanters, \w sorcerers|strong="H3784"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* astrologers \f + \fr 2:2 \ft Or Chaldeans; also in verses 4, 5, and 10\f* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w explain|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*. \w When|strong="H2472"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,

\w he|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w anxious|strong="H6470"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* astrologers \w answered|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Aramaic,\f + \fr 2:4 \ft The original text from this point of Daniel 2:4 through Daniel 7:28 is in Aramaic.\f* “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w live|strong="H2418"\w* \w forever|strong="H5957"\w*! \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w replied|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* astrologers, “\w My|strong="H4430"\w* \w word|strong="H4406"\w* \w is|strong="H4406"\w* final: \w If|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H4481"\w* \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* tell \w me|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*, \w you|strong="H4481"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w cut|strong="H5648"\w* into \w pieces|strong="H1917"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* your \w houses|strong="H1005"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* \w reduced|strong="H7761"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* rubble.

\w But|strong="H4481"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H4481"\w* tell \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*, \w you|strong="H4481"\w* will \w receive|strong="H6902"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4978"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w rewards|strong="H5023"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w great|strong="H7690"\w* \w honor|strong="H3367"\w*. \w So|strong="H2006"\w* tell \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H3367"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

They \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8579"\w* \w time|strong="H8579"\w*, “Let \w the|strong="H2324"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* tell \w the|strong="H2324"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5649"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4430"\w* give \w the|strong="H2324"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w replied|strong="H6032"\w*, “\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w sure|strong="H3330"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* stalling \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H5732"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w see|strong="H2370"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* \w word|strong="H4406"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* final.

\w If|strong="H2006"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* do \w not|strong="H3809"\w* tell \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w there|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* only \w one|strong="H2298"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*. \w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* conspired \w to|strong="H6925"\w* speak \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w false|strong="H3538"\w* \w and|strong="H2493"\w* fraudulent \w words|strong="H4406"\w*, hoping \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w situation|strong="H5732"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w change|strong="H8133"\w*. Therefore tell \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w and|strong="H2493"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w can|strong="H1768"\w* give \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* astrologers \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, “\w No|strong="H3809"\w* \w one|strong="H1836"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H3007"\w* \w can|strong="H3202"\w* \w do|strong="H5922"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* requests! \w No|strong="H3809"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, however \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* powerful, \w has|strong="H1768"\w* \w ever|strong="H3809"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w anything|strong="H4406"\w* \w like|strong="H4406"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w magician|strong="H2749"\w*, enchanter, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* astrologer.

\w What|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* requests \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w difficult|strong="H3358"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* one \w can|strong="H1768"\w* tell \w it|strong="H1321"\w* \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w except|strong="H3861"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* gods, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w mortals|strong="H1321"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* response made \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w so|strong="H6903"\w* \w furious|strong="H7108"\w* \w with|strong="H6903"\w* anger \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w he|strong="H6903"\w* gave orders \w to|strong="H4430"\w* destroy \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon.

So \w the|strong="H6992"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \w went|strong="H1841"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* that \w the|strong="H6992"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* were \w to|strong="H5312"\w* \w be|strong="H1841"\w* executed, \w and|strong="H1156"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w went|strong="H1841"\w* \w to|strong="H5312"\w* look \w for|strong="H1156"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H1156"\w* \w his|strong="H1156"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* \w to|strong="H5312"\w* execute them. The Dream Revealed to Daniel

\w When|strong="H1768"\w* Arioch, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* commander \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*’s \w guard|strong="H2877"\w*, \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w gone|strong="H5312"\w* \w out|strong="H5312"\w* \w to|strong="H2942"\w* execute \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w replied|strong="H8421"\w* \w with|strong="H8421"\w* \w discretion|strong="H5843"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* tact.

“\w Why|strong="H4101"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w so|strong="H1768"\w* harsh?” \w he|strong="H1768"\w* asked. \w At|strong="H4406"\w* \w this|strong="H5922"\w* time Arioch explained \w the|strong="H5922"\w* situation \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w asked|strong="H1156"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H1156"\w* \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w some|strong="H4481"\w* \w time|strong="H2166"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.

Then \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* returned \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w and|strong="H1005"\w* explained \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w matter|strong="H4406"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w his|strong="H3046"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4333"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5839"\w*,

urging \w them|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* plead \w for|strong="H5922"\w* mercy \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w mystery|strong="H7328"\w*, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w friends|strong="H2269"\w* would \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w be|strong="H3809"\w* killed \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Babylon.

During \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w night|strong="H3916"\w*, \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w mystery|strong="H7328"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1541"\w* \w to|strong="H1541"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w in|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* God \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*

\w and|strong="H6032"\w* declared: “\w Blessed|strong="H1289"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* God \w forever|strong="H5957"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w ever|strong="H5957"\w*, \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w power|strong="H1370"\w* \w belong|strong="H1932"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w Him|strong="H4481"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w changes|strong="H8133"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w seasons|strong="H2166"\w*; \w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w removes|strong="H5709"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w establishes|strong="H6966"\w* \w them|strong="H3052"\w*. \w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w gives|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H4486"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* discerning.

\w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w reveals|strong="H1541"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w deep|strong="H5994"\w* \w and|strong="H5094"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5642"\w* \w things|strong="H5642"\w*; \w He|strong="H1932"\w* \w knows|strong="H3046"\w* \w what|strong="H4101"\w* lies in \w darkness|strong="H2816"\w*, \w and|strong="H5094"\w* \w light|strong="H5094"\w* \w dwells|strong="H8271"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w Him|strong="H5974"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3046"\w* \w You|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* fathers, \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w give|strong="H3052"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3029"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w praise|strong="H7624"\w*, \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2452"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w power|strong="H1370"\w*. \w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w me|strong="H3052"\w* \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w requested|strong="H1156"\w*, \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w You|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* us \w the|strong="H4481"\w* dream \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.” Daniel Interprets the Dream

\w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* Arioch, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4483"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H5922"\w* not execute \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Babylon! \w Bring|strong="H5954"\w* \w me|strong="H5922"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H1836"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* give \w him|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

Arioch hastily \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*, “\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w among|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1123"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* tell \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3046"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w responded|strong="H6032"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1096"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w able|strong="H3546"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* tell me \w what|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3046"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*, \w as|strong="H1768"\w* well \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w its|strong="H6591"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*?”

\w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, “\w No|strong="H3809"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* man, enchanter, medium, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w magician|strong="H2749"\w* \w can|strong="H3202"\w* explain \w to|strong="H3202"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* \w mystery|strong="H7328"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* inquires.
